biocontainers.name: pgsa
biocontainers.summary: Pseudogenome Suffix Array is a compact index for collections of reads from sequencing.

biotools.summary: Compact index for collections of reads from sequencing. It allows to ask for presence of k-mers in the reads.

bioschemas.name: PgSA
bioschemas.summary: Compact index for collections of reads from sequencing. It allows to ask for presence of k-mers in the reads.
